name: MLTask
desc: An abstract base class for machine learning tasks.

items.name: var taskIdentifier: String
items.desc: A unique name of the task to distinguish it from all other tasks at runtime.

items.name: func resume()
items.desc: Begins or resumes a machine learning task.

items.name: func cancel()
items.desc: Cancels a machine learning task before it completes.

items.name: var state: MLTaskState
items.desc: The current state of the machine learning task.

items.name: enum MLTaskState
items.desc: The state of a machine learning task.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: The underlying error if the task is in a failed state.
